content: I ended up jumping back to PC (with a sleek top-of-the-line gaming laptop) after being on Mac for many years. Partly because I wanted a machine I could play games on (my wife passed away and I needed something to fill the boredom, so I got into games and game streaming), but also because the Windows versions of the apps I had moved into using (Office being one) were superior to their Mac versions. I do miss AppleScript, which I used to automate everything, but PowerShell is a formidable competitor. Microsoft has been catching up quickly with Mr. Ballmer finally out of the way.
